deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes storage ref[] storage pointer,bytes storage ref)
function (bytes storage ref[] storage pointer,bytes storage ref)

isPublicKeyRegistered(address).details: Checks if a user has registered a public key.

params.user: The address of the user to verify.

returns._0: True if the user has a registered public key, false otherwise.

registerPublicKey(bytes).details: Registers a public key for the sender.

params.publicKey: The public key to register (must be a valid ECDSA public key). Requirements: - `publicKey` cannot be empty.
